游戏本身是挺好的，也比较的有意思。但如果可以增加个PVE模式就更好了

一是不用排队等那么久才开一把；
二是可以照顾到新入坑的萌新，可以帮他们更快地刷到足够的血点，从而获得该有的技能（技能不齐真的很难玩，一个只有2-3个LJ技能的萌新屠夫面对4个全都满技能的人类，日常被三跑四跑外带各种1212，心态再好多玩几局都想弃坑了。长此以往这个游戏的圈子只会越来越小，人也越来越少，到时就更加难匹配到人了）；
三是可以用来熟悉地图，学学跑图和怎么转点

So, I loved this game. I loved the premise of this game. I'm a giant horror fan so the aesthetic itself should have just won me over but this game has so many flaws that the dev team refuses to fix and blatantly ignores. 

- The community is super toxic and rude. They rank down intentionally to rank 20 in order to bully new players.
Usually played survivor so I switched to killer and played roughly 6 rank 20 matches, and 5 of them were against people who had obviously ranked down. If you are a new player trying to learn the game, don't bother. You won't be able to get any practice in, especially if you are trying to play the killer.

- The dev team is toxic. They refer to camping and body blocking the hook and pallet looping [which are all essentially boring, stally, cheaty mechanics that abuse the game's physics] as genuine strategies so they don't have to try and balance anything. When confronted about how aspects of their game do not work, especially for new players, their response is the same toxic "gg" bs instead of making an effort to balance their game. 

- The rank reset does NOT work for this type of game. Get ready for your progress to be reset over and over, and to be forced to play boring matches outside of your skill level. If you're a new player, be ready to be stomped on by a TON of players every reset while you're struggling to get out of rank 20. 

- Even if you don't care about rank and you are just trying to play the game for fun I have news for you, that's not going to be possible. Because the people who are ranking down to play with you are actively doing it to be toxic, so they are going to use as many scummy techniques as possible to frustrate you. 

Bad community, bad dev team, and a game that could have been wonderful. 
Until these issues are fixed, this game doesn't deserve a good review.

Developers do not care. Buggy game play, toxic killers and survivors, I lose points and ranks if someone else disconnects. Any time someone complains they delete the review or say go play another game. The game is made by a bunch of noob killer mains that make the game less scary as it is a chore. You may find a bit of thrill your first few games, but that magic wears off when you get hit from across the map from lag, or a killer face camps you because you were too good to "secure the kill". If the developers would fix the 50,000 bugs and the ability for killers to face camp then maybe this game would shine more.

I use to enjoy playing this game but these days its just not fun to play...
Also the devs care not for the long term players because they are more focused on how to rip people off with each dlc they bring out.
DLCs on release are really good then the devs nerf the hell out of the killer or survivors perks or play style because of moaning newcomers screaming for nerfs to be done. This game feels like its still in beta or early access with all the bugs and broken mechanics such as hit boxes. Also I was invited to complete 20 games on the vanilla ptb no perks no add on's etc with the promise of a reward. I did not get said reward so I had to contact customer support 4 days of them asking me to provide proof which I did they finally got back to me and said...

Thank you for your patience.

ROVER have checked their data and are now certain that all users who were entitled to receive their refunds have now had them.

Unfortunately, if you still have not received these bloodpoints and shards, then this means you did not fulfil the experiment's criteria. There are several possible reasons for this:
- You did not play the required number of valid games
- You played multiple games with items/perks equipped
- You disconnected too many times
- You did not solo queue
- You played on the "live" build, not the specific PTB environment
- You were not invited to the test

Their decision is final and we will not look to overturn this.

I am sorry for any disappointment this may cause, but we are unable to assist you further with this query.

So they ignore all the proof I sent them ie video evidence of all my games steam id and copy of my email and said we will ignore your proof and not pay you for your time you invested in us.

If its not bad enough these devs care not for the long term players they are killing their own game by bringing out great new content then when many have brought said DLCs they then nerf them into the ground.

Dead by Daylight - это прекрасный пример того как игра с интресной задумкой превратилась в полную помойку из-за пoхyизмa разработчиков. С каждым новым маньяком больше +- плохих перков. Маньяки которые ни чего не могут почти. Сурвы с бесполезными перками. И все это стоит денег. Система рангов которая сломана. Ты будучи последним рангом можешь попасться с или против максимального ранга. Карты сделаны так прекрасно что ты можешь застопится об не видимую кализию целого ничего. Отвратительный пинг на серверах из-за чего не прожимаются полетки и не прыгаешь в окна. Прекрасная оптимизация игры, которая очень часто крашается без причины. А ещё чаще потом требует переустановить 40 гб игры. Спасибо хоть что покупать заного не надо. 3 из 10.

It's good to play. I used to be Dota2 main player but I quit it because of cancer and many player are smurf and boosting. Now this game, it doesn't make me so bad because 
-some connection problem quit don't punish me.
-no chat box except post and after game that prevent trash talking.
-if you love to play with team, you can do that.
-also if you sick of trash team? you still able to play solo, killer.
-people will not smurf as they have to pay R$ 36,99.(I am not sure about those rich people)
-every 13th rank reset, who would boost?
This game has so many bugs and I already saw it. But it doesn't matter cause it just for fun. If your lose? It doesn't matter. It just for fun even it is ranked. No one will punish you for rage quitting or other problem quitting. 
So please try this. it is just R$ 36,99. I don't know how much in dollar but you may buy in some events for discount.
(PS. I really love Dota, I just hate this cancer sever and booster. No offensive for Dota, seriously)

如果你想入坑，请慎重，如果你不是因为别人推荐想一起开黑，又或者念旧回想起这个游戏可以直播的年代看着那些主播精彩的操作想试一试，那么建议你不要购买并游玩此游戏。说实话，杀机，对于我来说，第一次见到他是在斗鱼TV一个叫六神的主播{这个人挺有趣的，然后就路转粉了}，黑暗的环境，紧张的气氛，与时间赛跑的人类和屠夫在斗智斗勇，都期待着获得胜利，这一切在那个时候都是那么的美好，现在，虽然仅仅200+的小时数对于一些资深大佬来说就是个小萌新，的确，我确实也是个萌新，毕竟1段也不是什么难事，还有很多套路和意识等着去实践和试验，但是，确实，有点累了，一个竞技类游戏对于我来说，这么短的时间，也确实够了，毕竟当初没有属于自己的银行卡，没有属于自己的电脑，所以对其具有强烈的好奇心，但是此时此刻，是真的累了，但是我觉得已经满足了，自己也亲身经历了，有缘再见吧，dead by daylight！
